a.title: quickLink
a.p: Silver Valley USD provides a public TK-12 education for the communities of Daggett, Yermo, Newberry Springs, Calico, Fort Irwin and MCLB.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Silver Valley USD works within it's own Strategic Plan that is aligned with the Local Control and Accountability Plan (LCAP). To learn more about the plans that make Silver Valley USD a top tier K-12 public school district click here.

p.a: Silver Valley USD is supported by great staff who continue to excel in their work departments. To learn more about each department, please click here.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Silver Valley USD is a top ranking school district in Southern California and a great place to work. Offering many fantastic opportunities and benefits, click here to find jobs.
